ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to prevent required fields to be modified for Payment Reversals.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Payment_Reversal', OR( ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Payment_Anchor__c), ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Reference_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Payment_Amount__c) ) )
